casebody.data:
Joseph P. Purcell v. Orvel Black et al. (10874)

Dupont, C. J., Heiman and Schaller, Js.

Argued December 9, 1992 decision released January 5, 1993 Ridgely W. Brown, with whom, on the brief, was Heather M. Brown, for the appellant (plaintiff). Dion W. Moore, for the appellee (named defendant). Kenneth B. Povodator, assistant corporation counsel, with whom, on the brief, was Daniel M. McCabe, corporation counsel, for the appellee (defendant city of Stamford et al.). Per Curiam.

The judgment is affirmed.
